page.title: 13The River Darent,Shoreham.
page.content:
The{river Darent}has played an important part in the life of Shoreham.At one time there were three working mills in Shoreham.Nowadays, with the advances in technology and the reduced flow of the river,its value as an amenity is as a fishing centre and for its beauty.
Mrs. Pollock's garden is bordered on two sides by the river.{Kingfishers} and{dragonflies}can be seen there. Among other plants and shrubs are {Cricket Bat Willow}trees.When their trunks are 50cm wide,they are cut down to make cricket bats.Another tree is always planted to replace the cut one.
The river flowing under the{part 14th {Century}bridge is so picturesque that many people come to see it.
